description: Kaga Hokuto is a friend of http://anidb.net/ch530 [Hinagiku] who runs a small café owned by http://anidb.net/ch613 [Sakuya] called Café Donguri. Hinagiku helps out there occasionally, and at one point, http://anidb.net/ch532 [Hayate], http://anidb.net/ch528 [Nagi], and http://anidb.net/ch628 [Ayumu] work there part-time. He also appears to help run Sakuya`s maid café, Himawari.
name: Kaga Hokuto
